properties.body:
WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 14.
1. 57 FOOT F/V ALEXANDRA, WHITE HULL, DISABLED
   AND ADRIFT DUE TO ENGINE FAILURE. LAST KNOWN
   POSITION 10-23N 057-19W AT 091100Z MAR. VESSELS
   IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
   ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE,
   TELEX: 42912008, PHONE: 596 596 709 292,
   FAX: 596 596 632 450.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 564/15.
